books.title: EDUCATED

books.author: Ron Chernow
books.description: A biography of the first Treasury secretary and one of the Founding Fathers of the United States. Originally published in 2004 and the basis of the Tony Award-winning Broadway musical. 36 hours, 2 minutes unabridged. Read by Scott Brick.
books.title: ALEXANDER HAMILTON

books.author: Doug Stanton
books.description: Special Forces soldiers fought the Taliban on horseback shortly after 9/11. First published in print as "Horse Soldiers." 16 hours, 40 minutes unabridged. Read by Jack Garrett.
books.title: HORSE SOLDIERS

books.author: Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: Why some people succeed — it has to do with luck and opportunities as well as talent. 7 hours, 17 minutes unabridged. Read by the author.
books.title: OUTLIERS

books.author: Ron Chernow
books.description: A biography of the Union general of the Civil War and two-term president of the United States. 48 hours, 1 minute unabridged. Read by Mark Bramhall.
books.title: GRANT

books.author: Daniel H Pink
books.description: Research reveals the ideal time to make small decisions and big life changes. 5 hours, 46 minutes unabridged. Read by the author.
books.title: WHEN

books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: A look into the future by the author of “Sapiens.” 14 hours, 53 minutes unabridged. Read by Derek Perkins.
books.title: HOMO DEUS

books.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb
books.description: An argument for taking on risk. 8 hours, 20 minutes unabridged. Read by Joe Ochman.
books.title: SKIN IN THE GAME
